Subject: Re: Backup for Prowl/Commander enters/Sublime.
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Firedrill was left alone with his thoughts. Not exactly the way he wanted
his first encounter with his new leader to go. But ah well what cha gonna
do. He decided not to wait inside all by himself, and followed Iron Raptor,
throught the hall ways and out the door. He then walked up, and stood a few
steps behind her.
